content:
Sure, I can auto-generate Gandalf's remaining information, stats, and equipment. Here is a possible set of choices for Gandalf:

* Gender: Male
* Alignment: Lawful good
* Background: Gandalf was born in a small village in the midst of a great forest. He was raised by his parents, who were both powerful wizards. Gandalf learned the ways of magic at an early age, and he quickly surpassed his teachers in skill and knowledge. As he grew older, he left the village to explore the world and learn even more about magic.
* Stats:
	+ Strength: 8
	+ Dexterity: 14
	+ Constitution: 14
	+ Intelligence: 18
	+ Wisdom: 17
	+ Charisma: 16

These stats are balanced and appropriate for a male wizard who is lawful good and was raised by powerful wizards. The high intelligence will help Gandalf understand and cast spells, and the high wisdom will help him make good decisions. The high charisma will help him interact with others, and the average strength and dexterity will reflect his focus on magic over physical prowess.

* Equipment:
	+ Quarterstaff
	+ Component pouch
	+ Arcane focus
	+ Spellbook
	+ Explorer's pack
	+ Robes
	+ 25 gold pieces

This equipment is appropriate for a wizard who is just starting out on their adventures. The quarterstaff and the robes will provide Gandalf with some basic defense, and the component pouch and the arcane focus will help him cast spells. The spellbook will contain the spells that Gandalf knows, and the explorer's pack will contain the supplies that he needs. The 25 gold pieces will allow Gandalf to purchase additional items if he needs them.

Do you want to make any changes to Gandalf's information, stats, or equipment, or are you happy with them as they are? Let me know, and we can move on to the next phase of the game.
